title: Robert Langer, Chemical Engineer At MIT
teaser: Host Jessica Harris talks with Robert Langer, a chemical engineer who has pioneered the fields of drug delivery and tissue engineering. Harris also talks with David Carmel, co-founder of Jumpstart.
contentencoded:
Host Jessica Harris talks with Robert Langer, a chemical engineer who has pioneered the fields of drug delivery and tissue engineering. Harris also talks with David Carmel, co-founder of Jumpstart.
